scene_description_enriched: A young woman in a red dress, holding a green book, stands to the left and looks up at an older woman in a blue mantle and white wimple. The older woman, with a halo, leans down and places her hand on the younger woman's shoulder. Both figures have halos, indicating their saintly status. The background is a rich, repeating pattern of gold and red squares, suggesting a divine or elevated setting. The scene is set against a green ground.
